backend/main.mo: Actor manages access control, auto‑registers users, stores profiles, and exposes profile and role operations plus blob‑storage mixin setup.
backend/migration.mo: Defines old and new data structures and provides migration logic to transform existing state to include custom tool support.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs with confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains human‑written summaries for key frontend files including hooks, pages, and components.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication flow, page navigation, and profile setup modal display.
frontend/src/components/CustomToolManage: Dialog UI for listing, creating, editing, and deleting custom tool definitions with form validation and React Query mutations.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that catches rendering errors and displays a fallback UI with reload option.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component showing branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with theme toggle, user menu, and authenticated navigation links.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Login landing page prompting users to authenticate and showcasing app features.
frontend/src/components/ModelBuilder.tsx: Complex model creation editor supporting ICT tools, custom tools, and tool configuration dialogs.
frontend/src/components/ModelCardSummary: Dialog summarizing a model’s tools and details with concise property extraction and save/back actions.
frontend/src/components/ModelWizard.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a model creation wizard.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for creating a user profile with name input and backend save integration.
frontend/src/components/ToolConfigDialog: Large dialog component for configuring tool properties with many predefined enums and dynamic form fields based on tool type.
frontend/src/components/TradeDetailDialo: Dialog for viewing and updating trade details including bracket outcomes, emotions, notes, and uploaded images.
frontend/src/components/TradeForm.tsx: Form for creating or editing a trade, handling model selection, trade parameters, validations, and scenario calculations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and related auth state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for profiles, models, trades, and custom tool definitions.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for colors and layout.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and an Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/Analytics.tsx: Displays trading and adherence analytics with charts, model filtering, and computed performance metrics.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Shows an overview of models and trades, computing performance stats and an equity curve.
frontend/src/pages/Models.tsx: Lists, creates, edits, and deletes trading models with a model builder dialog.
frontend/src/pages/Trades.tsx: Manages viewing, filtering, sorting, editing, and deleting trades, including status detection and detail dialogs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom OKLCH color tokens, extended theme settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines current project state, versioning, and a detailed feature inventory for the ICT Trading Logger dapp including authentication, RBAC, models, trades, and frontend/backend architecture.
